title: Is reciting a surah after fateha mandatory? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: once i finish the fatiha i can go to record whoa wait wait wait there's a sure afterwards i know there's a surah afterwards the surah is a sunnah there is a surah after the fatiha but it is a sunnah so if i say my prayer is valid i didn't know that now you know if i say it in maghrib it's valid if i say it in asia it's valid the sunnah is to recite of asura afterwards or reverse as a minimum and the sky's the limit
